meta.title: Cart abandonment email series without coupon

data.subject: Was there a problem checking out?
data.body:
Hi {{cart_billing_first_name}}

We noticed that you were trying to purchase from our store. Here's your cart: 

{{cart_items template='cart-table'}} 

But you couldn't complete the process. 

Was there an issue in checking out?

Click here and we'll transport you right back to your cart. 

Thanks!

data.subject: Act fast! The stock’s running out...
data.body:
Hi {{cart_billing_first_name}}

Just following up to see if you're facing any issue with making a purchase. 

Here are the items still reserved for you in your cart: 

{{cart_items template='cart-table'}}

These items are always in demand and run out fast. So act before they’re gone. 

Click here to let us take you back to your cart. 

Thanks!
